attributes.action: re-classify ethnic groups, so they have their own ethnic ID
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The term chinese is applied to all people of east asian heritage even if there British and dont have chinese heritage, this is stupid. The term asain is given to asian brits but there not asain if there born in europe, once again stupid!. I suggest we have the following - 
Britsh followed by the ethnic group, or not britsh if not a british citizen:
White, Black, Brown (to replace asain, this is popular amoung British asian youth), Oriental (to replace chinese, this is also popular already in the UK), Hispanic (not currently recodnized but needs to be as this is a race), Mixed-race (e.g Mixed white-black est)and Other. So ethnic groups in the UK will be under the term e.g. British black or other Black, British oriental or other oriental est.
